name: Markify
description: Markify is a trademark search company, focused on similarity technologies. Entrepreneurs, brand name creators and domain name buyers can with Markify, for free,  check any name to see whether anyone is already operating under a similar trademark - both in the US (USPTO data) and in Europe (CTM data). This enables them to avoid such names in their search for a new domain name or trademark. Otherwise there is a risk that they might have to change their name later.

apis.name: Markify
apis.description: his document provides the technical details of the Markify trademark search API and illustrates the API usage by explicit code examples written in PHP. The Markify trademark search API is a HTTP based Web Service API. As a client, you can use any HTTP library you like to access the API. The result can be transmitted as XML or JSON data.
